attributes.action: Unfair dismissal of a staff member at Brindishe Lee.
attributes.additional_details:
Unfair dismissal of a staff member Shani Newman at Brindishe Lee Primary school. Se12.
Dismissed after displaying a Union Jack & poppy picture on her own private Facebook page!
This is outrageous.
As a mother of mixed raced children, this staff member has been nothing but polite, caring, understanding, & a pleasure to have come into contact with!
A complete injustice has been done!
